snippet.title: Splinter Cell Blacklist | First Gameplay Demo
snippet.description:
Official website: http://splintercell.com
Facebook page: http://splintercell.com/facebook 
In this video, Creative Director Maxime Béland introduces the first gameplay video for Splinter Cell Blacklist. Sam inflitrates a  camp near the Iran/Iraq border, where Fourth Echelon has located a terrorist leader.
Splinter Cell Blacklist will be released in Spring 2013 on Xbox 360, Playstation 3 and PC.
